title: My Second Quarto Post
text: I am getting the hang of this, perhaps. What do you mean?

title: Experiments in Generative Art
text: I have been working on a new project that combines knot theory with music.

title: Experiments in Generative Art
text:
The Concept
We are looking for a way to visualize the “interface” between geometric forms and organic forms.

title: Experiments in Generative Art
text:
The Code
Here is a snippet of the Wolfram Language code I am using:
```wolfram Table[Style[k, Hue[k/20]], {k, 1, 20}]
##The Math
The core of the structure relies on the flow polytope equation:
\[ \mathcal{F}G = \left{ x \in \mathbb{R}^E : \sum{e \in \text{in}(v)} x_e = \sum_{e \in \text{out}(v)} x_e \right} \]






Note



Note that there are five types of callouts, including: note, tip, warning, caution, and important.

title: My First Quarto Post
text:
This is a test post.
Here is a flow polytope equation: \[K_G(t) = \sum_{i=0}^{d} c_i t^i\]
I did not have to write HTML to make that math work.
